question: The Indian Super League (ISL) club FC Pune City appointed Brazilian __________ as their head coach?
explanation: Marcos Paqueta was appointed as the head coach of The Indian Super League (ISL) club FC Pune City. He also guided the team of Saudi Arabia in 2006 World Cup. He has managed national teams of U-17 and U-20 of Brazil. He has an experience of 30 years.
